mapper.select: select a.id, a.visit_id, d.mib_id, (select baa027 from insure_individual_basic iib where d.mib_id = iib.id) as baa027, (select iib.aac001 from insure_individual_basic iib where d.mib_id = iib.id) as aac001, d.medical_reg_no, a.settle_id, a.insureSettleId, a.hosp_code, b.in_profile, b.name, b.age, b.gender_code, b.birthday, b.nationality_cation, b.nation_code, b.cert_code, b.cert_no as certno, b.occupation_code, b.contact_name, b.contact_rela_code, b.contact_address, b.contact_phone, b.insure_code, '1' as aka130, b.patient_code, b.in_dept_id, (select nation_code from base_dept bd where bd.id = b.in_dept_id and bd.hosp_code = b.hosp_code) as inDeptCode, b.out_dept_id, (select nation_code from base_dept bd where bd.id = b.in_dept_id and bd.hosp_code = b.hosp_code) as outDeptCode, b.out_mode_code, a.insureSettleId, a.personal_price, a.person_price, a.settleway, a.insure_org_code, a.crte_time, d.insuplc_admdvs from insure_individual_settle a left join inpt_visit b on a.visit_id = b.id left join insure_individual_visit d on a.visit_id = d.visit_id where a.insureSettleId = #{insureSettleId} and a.state = '0' order by a.visit_id

select a.id, a.visit_id , a.settle_id, d.medical_reg_no, a.insureSettleId, a.hosp_code, d.mib_id, (select baa027 from insure_individual_basic iib where d.mib_id = iib.id) as baa027, b.out_profile as inProfile, b.name, b.age, d.visit_drpt_id, (select nation_code from base_dept bd where bd.id = d.visit_drpt_id and bd.hosp_code = d.hosp_code) as inDeptCode, (select nation_code from base_dept bd where bd.id = d.visit_drpt_id and bd.hosp_code = d.hosp_code) as outDeptCode, b.gender_code, b.birthday, d.visit_drpt_id, (select nation_code from base_dept bd where bd.id = d.visit_drpt_id and bd.hosp_code = d.hosp_code) as inDeptCode, (select nation_code from base_dept bd where bd.id = d.visit_drpt_id and bd.hosp_code = d.hosp_code) as outDeptCode, b.nation_code, b.cert_code, b.cert_no as certno, b.insure_code, b.patient_code, '2' as aka130, a.insureSettleId, a.crte_time, a.personal_price, a.person_price, a.settleway, a.insure_org_code, a.crte_time, d.insuplc_admdvs from insure_individual_settle a left join outpt_visit b on a.visit_id = b.id left join insure_individual_visit d on a.visit_id = d.visit_id where a.insureSettleId = #{insureSettleId} order by a.visit_id

select b.insure_illness_name as name, b.insure_illness_code as diseaseId from outpt_diagnose a, insure_disease_match b where a.visit_id = #{visitId} and a.disease_id = b.hosp_illness_id and a.hosp_code = #{hospCode} and b.insure_illness_code is not null
